title: Whodini (Whodini, Escape, Back In Black)
description:
Three albums from the hip hop/rap artists Whodini.

[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/ad/Whodini_album.jpg[/img]

Whodini - Whodini

Release: 1983
Genre: Hip Hop/Rap
Bitrate: 192

Whodini is the self-titled debut album by the hip-hop group Whodini. It was released in 1983 on Jive/Arista Records and spawned two hit singles, "Magic&#039;s Wand" and "The Haunted House of Funk". "Magic&#039;s Wand" appeared in the videogame Grand Theft Auto: Vice City, on the Wildstyle Pirate Radio radio station.

Track Listing

   1. "The Haunted House of Funk"
   2. "Nasty Lady"
   3. "Underground"
   4. "It&#039;s All in Mr Magic&#039;s Wand"
   5. "Magic&#039;s Wand
   6. "Yours For a Night"
   7. "Rap Machine"
   8. "The Haunted House of Funk" (Remix)

[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/e/e0/Whodini_escape.jpg[/img]
Whodini - Escape

Release: 1985
Genre: Hip Hop/Rap
Bitrate: 192

Escape is the second album by hip hop group Whodini, released in 1985 (see 1985 in music) on the Jive label. The album spawned the hit singles "Five Minutes of Funk," "Friends," and "Freaks Come out at Night". In 1998, the album was selected as one of The Source Magazine&#039;s 100 Best Rap Albums.

[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/f/f9/Whodinigroup.jpg[/img]
Whodini - Back In Black

Release: 1986
Genre: Hip Hop/Rap
Bitrate: 192

Black In Black, released in 1986, was the third album by American Hip Hop group, Whodini. The album spawned three singles, "Funky Beat", "Growning Up" and "One Love". The album was certified platinum by RIAA.
